description: A frontier town on Cactus Island at the entrance to the Grand Line, populated entirely by Baroque Works bounty hunters who pretend to welcome pirates before attacking them.

keyEvents.title: Zoro vs Baroque Works Continues
keyEvents.description: Zoro continues his battle against the Baroque Works agents throughout Whisky Peak.
keyEvents.significance: The town becomes a battleground revealing its true nature as a bounty hunter base.

keyEvents.title: Officer Agents Arrive
keyEvents.description: Mr. 5 and Miss Valentine arrive at Whisky Peak to eliminate the spies.
keyEvents.significance: Escalates the conflict with the arrival of higher-ranking Baroque Works agents.

keyEvents.title: Spy Revelation
keyEvents.description: The true identities of Vivi and Igaram are exposed at Whisky Peak.
keyEvents.significance: Transforms the location from a simple bounty hunter town to the site of a major conspiracy revelation.

statusHistory.reason: Town continues to operate as a Baroque Works base
